name: Pac Biz (Formally Pacific Business)
description:
We give taxi companies an opportunity to compete in a global economy and take on bigger competitors. We also take inbound calls to set appointments and help qualify customers. Based in Phoenix, Arizona but operated out of Dumaguete, Philippines, Pacific Business Services offers call center services for companies in the US, Canada and the UK.
Our office full of college educated, English speaking professionals can help you focus on growing your business and let us handle providing quality customer service.
